title: Hilarious Pampered Consort: Lord I Will Wait for Your Divorce - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Drama   Ancient China   Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Charming Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Confident Protagonist   Cultivation   Divorce   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Imperial Harem   Matriarchy   Multiple Identities   Possessive Characters   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shameless Protagonist   Transmigration
author: Sui Yu Er An   随宇而安   隨宇而安
description:
“When I tell you to do A, you can’t just ignore it and do B,” the Prince said.

“Sure,” she replied. She’ll just do C, then! No biggie.

“If I tell you to go east, you can’t ignore me and go west,” the Prince added.

“Yes,” she nodded. If she can’t go west, north or south works fine too.

“You are NOT allowed to have an affair with any other men!” the Prince emphasized.

“Obviously,” she said. Why would she have an affair with others when they could just have it with her?

Qu Tan'er has transmigrated into the body of a noble young lady and forced to marry the ice-cold 8th prince. Her only care in this world is finding a way to get back to her original body and dealing with all the politics and intrigue surrounding the marriage is just a distraction. 

Lord, don't let our marriage be a bother. Just give me a divorce!>
